TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider extends System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider

summary.span: 管理 Active Directory 和 Active Directory 應用程式模式伺服器中 ASP.NET 應用程式之成員資格資訊的儲存。

span.span: Manages storage of membership information for an ASP.NET application in Active Directory and Active Directory Application Mode servers.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 這個類別由和提供使用 Active Directory (AD) 或 Active Directory 應用程式模式 (ADAM) 伺服器的 ASP.NET 應用程式的成員資格服務的類別。This class is used by the and classes to provide membership services for an ASP.NET application using an Active Directory (AD) or Active Directory Application Mode (ADAM) server. > [!NOTE] > 使用 ADAM 伺服器需要使用特定的組態。Using an ADAM server requires specific configuration. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱下方的 ADAM 組態區段。For more information, see the ADAM Configuration section below. > [!IMPORTANT] > 執行個體只適用於 ASP.NET 的完全信任原則預設設定。The instance works only in the full-trust policy default configuration of ASP.NET. 若要使用執行個體在任何部分信任層級中，您必須適當的信任原則檔案進行變更，您的應用程式或您必須建立 「 沙箱 」 組件部署在 GAC 中。In order to use the instance at any partial-trust level, either you must make changes to the appropriate trust policy file for your application or you must create a "sandbox" assembly that is deployed in the GAC. > > 類別會要求不受限制的執行權限。The class requires unrestricted permission to run. 此權限不會加入至任何使用 ASP.NET 所提供的部分信任原則檔案。This permission is not added to any of the partial-trust policy files supplied with ASP.NET. 雖然新增部分信任原則檔案的權限可讓使用類別，執行動作，讓ASP.NET 網頁中執行任何程式碼可使用的命名空間類別。Although adding the permission to a partial-trust policy file will enable use of the class, doing so makes the namespace classes available to any code running in your ASP.NET pages. 這個選項不需要在安全的鎖定模式中執行任何 Web 伺服器的建議。This option is not recommended for any Web servers that need to run in a secure, locked-down mode. > > 或者，您可以建立 「 沙箱 」 組件呼叫類別。As an alternative, you can create a "sandbox" assembly that calls the class. 這個組件可以包含其中一個轉送的方法呼叫的包裝函式類別類別或衍生自類別類別。This assembly can contain either a wrapper class that forwards method calls to the class or a class that derives from the class. 在任一情況下，包裝函式類別必須判斷提示不受限制權限。In either case, the wrapper class must assert unrestricted permission. 部署在 GAC 中的沙箱組件，並將標示組件(APTCA) 屬性。Deploy the sandbox assembly in the GAC and mark the assembly with the (APTCA) attribute. 這會讓部分信任的 ASP.NET 程式碼呼叫您的包裝函式類別，但因為包裝函式類別內部判斷提示不受限制權限，您的包裝函式類別都能夠成功呼叫提供者This will enable your partially trusted ASP.NET code to call your wrapper class, and since the wrapper class internally asserts the unrestricted permission, your wrapper class will be able to successfully call the provider 您必須建立[connectionStrings 項目 （ASP.NET 設定結構描述）](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6ffbb2e-a4d1-410e-8f7e-9755e92c65de)識別 Active Directory 伺服器、 Active Directory 網域或若要使用的 ADAM 應用程式磁碟分割在 Web.config 檔案中的項目。You must create a [connectionStrings Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6ffbb2e-a4d1-410e-8f7e-9755e92c65de) entry in the Web.config file that identifies the Active Directory server, Active Directory domain, or ADAM application partition to use. 提供者只會在網域範圍，或在網域內的子範圍中。The provider will only operate at domain scope, or in a subscope within a domain. 下表列出允許的連接字串，所使用的範圍。The following table lists allowed connection strings and the scope used. |連接字串Connection string|範圍Scope| |-----------------------|-----------| |LDAP: / /\<網域或伺服器 >: [port]LDAP://\:[port]

ADAM 的選擇性而不需要 Active Directory 的通訊埠編號。Port number is optional for ADAM and not needed for Active Directory.|提供者會針對指定的網域或伺服器執行。The provider runs against the specified domain or server. 使用 AD 中，使用者建立和刪除會進行預設使用者容器中。With AD, user creation and deletion is done in the default users container. 所有其他作業，包括任何搜尋方法，將網域根位置的預設命名內容。All other operations, including any search methods, will be rooted at the default naming context for the domain.

如果連接字串指定 Active Directory 網域，而不是特定伺服器和屬性是`true`、一律都會連線到網域，以確保該密碼的 PDC 角色的伺服器執行個體變更生效，並使用方法呼叫。If the connection string specifies an Active Directory domain rather than a specific server and the property is `true`, the instance will always connect to the server with the PDC role for the domain to ensure that password changes take effect and are available when the method is called.

這個連接字串時，不允許使用 ADAM，並將擲回。This connection string is not allowed when using ADAM, and will throw a .| |LDAP: / /\<網域或伺服器 >: [port] /\<容器 dn >LDAP://\:[port]/\

ADAM 的選擇性而不需要 Active Directory 的通訊埠編號。Port number is optional for ADAM and not needed for Active Directory.|提供者會針對指定的網域或伺服器執行。The provider runs against the specified domain or server. 使用者建立和刪除只是在指定的容器。User creation and deletion is only done in the specified container. 所有其他作業，包括任何搜尋方法執行容器為根部的樹狀子目錄搜尋。All other operations, including any search methods, perform subtree searches rooted at the container.

ADAM 伺服器容器會指定應用程式分割或應用程式磁碟分割內的容器的根目錄。For ADAM servers, the container specifies the root of an application partition, or a container within an application partition.

我們建議連接字串會定義特定的容器來改善效能。We recommend that the connection string define a specific container to improve performance.| 執行個體會對應至 directory 屬性屬性。The instance maps directory attributes to properties. 如果沒有屬性對應會在 Web.config 檔案中完成，會使用預設屬性。Default attributes are used if no attribute mapping is done in the Web.config file. 如需有關屬性對應的詳細資訊，請參閱中的個別屬性類別文件。For more information on attribute mappings, see the individual properties in the class documentation. 下表列出屬性和其預設值的屬性對應。The following table lists the properties and their default attribute mappings. > [!IMPORTANT] > 類別不會明確地檢查提供者屬性不對應到使用者物件在目錄中的核心屬性。The class does not explicitly check that provider attributes are not mapped to core attributes of the user object in the directory. 您必須確定目錄中的機密資訊不會公開對應的屬性。You must ensure that sensitive information from the directory is not exposed through mapped attributes. |屬性Property|預設目錄屬性Default directory attribute|可對應嗎？Can be mapped?| |--------------|---------------------------------|--------------------| ||securityIdentifiersecurityIdentifier|否No| ||userPrincipalNameuserPrincipalName|是，但必須是 userPrincipalName 或 sAMAccountNameYes, but must be either userPrincipalName or sAMAccountName| ||註解comment|否No| ||whenCreatedwhenCreated|否No| ||郵件mail|是，但必須是 Unicode 字串類型的單一值屬性。Yes, but must be a single-valued attribute of type Unicode String.| ||N/An/a|不支援。Not supported by .| ||N/An/a|不支援。Not supported by .| ||pwdLastSetpwdLastSet|否No| ||無none|是，但必須是 Unicode 字串類型的單一值屬性。Yes, but must be a single-valued attribute of type Unicode String.| ||使用者帳戶控制 (AD)User-Account-Control (AD)

mDS Msds-useraccountdisabled (ADAM)mDS-UserAccountDisabled (ADAM)|否No| ||計算從 lockoutTime 和廣告鎖定持續時間 (在 Windows 2000 上的 AD)computed from lockoutTime and the AD lockout duration (AD on Windows 2000)

使用者的帳戶-控制項-計算 (AD 上 Windows Server 2003)msDS-User-Account-Control-Computed (AD on Windows Server 2003)

使用者的帳戶-控制項-計算 (ADAM)msDS-User-Account-Control-Computed (ADAM)|否No| ||如果使用者因為不正確的密碼嘗試次數過多而遭到鎖定，鎖定時間屬性會傳回。If user is locked out due to too many bad password attempts, the lockout time attribute is returned.

如果使用者鎖定因為太多錯誤密碼解答嘗試，儲存在所定義之屬性的值`attributeMapFailedPasswordAnswerLockoutTime`傳回。If user is locked out due to too many bad password answer attempts, the value stored in the attribute defined by `attributeMapFailedPasswordAnswerLockoutTime` is returned.

如果使用者鎖定因為發生錯誤的密碼並不正確的密碼嘗試次數過多，最新的日期/時間值會傳回。If user is locked out due to both a bad password and too many bad password attempts, the most recent date/time value is returned.

如果帳戶未鎖定，則傳回 1/1/1754 為了與 SQL 相容。If the account is not locked out, return 1/1/1754 for SQL compatibility.|否No| 當同時和屬性`true`、類別支援密碼重設安全性透過要求使用者回答預先決定的資訊。When both the and properties are `true`, the class supports password-reset security by requiring the user to answer a predetermined question. 若要支援的問題和解答，您必須設定下列組態屬性使用[新增項目 （ASP.NET 設定結構描述） 的成員資格提供者](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8423ec7f-a06d-4606-977e-a46400b2fc18)應用程式組態檔中。To support the question and answer, you must set the following configuration attributes using the [add Element for providers for membership (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8423ec7f-a06d-4606-977e-a46400b2fc18) in the application configuration file. |組態屬性Configuration attribute|屬性類型Attribute type| |-----------------------------|--------------------| |`attributeMapPasswordQuestion`|必須是 Unicode 字串類型的單一值屬性。Must be a single-valued attribute of type Unicode String.| |`attributeMapPasswordAnswer`|必須是 Unicode 字串類型的單一值屬性。Must be a single-valued attribute of type Unicode String.| |`attributeMapFailedPasswordAnswerCount`|必須是整數類型的單一值屬性。Must be a single-valued attribute of type Integer.| |`attributeMapFailedPasswordAnswerTime`|必須是單一值屬性的型別大的整數間隔。Must be a single-valued attribute of type Large Integer/Interval.| |`attributeMapFailedPasswordAnswerLockoutTime`|必須是單一值屬性的型別大的整數間隔。Must be a single-valued attribute of type Large Integer/Interval.| 如需有關使用密碼重設安全性的詳細資訊，請參閱屬性。For more information on using password-reset security, see the property. ## Active Directory 連線Active Directory connections 當類別用來連接到 Active Directory 或 Active Directory 應用程式模式 (ADAM) 伺服器，`connectionProtection`屬性已設定使用[新增項目 （ASP.NET 設定結構描述） 的成員資格提供者](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8423ec7f-a06d-4606-977e-a46400b2fc18)的應用程式組態檔可能會限制的作業類型類別可以透過連接執行。When the class is used to connect to an Active Directory or an Active Directory Application Mode (ADAM) server, the `connectionProtection` attribute that is set using the [add Element for providers for membership (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8423ec7f-a06d-4606-977e-a46400b2fc18) in the application configuration file may restrict the types of operations the class can perform over the connection. `connectionProtection`屬性也會決定方法執行個體將用來建立 Active Directory 或 ADAM 伺服器的連線。The `connectionProtection` attribute also determines the methods the instance will use to create the connection to the Active Directory or ADAM server. 下表顯示的效果`connectionProtection`屬性連接到 Active Directory 時。The following table shows the effect of the `connectionProtection` attribute when connecting to an Active Directory. |`connectionProtection` 設定`connectionProtection` setting|作用Effect| |------------------------------------|------------| ||類別將會連接到 Active Directory，請遵循這些限制。The class will connect to an Active Directory, with these restrictions.

-任何設定密碼的方法將會失敗。- Any method that sets a password will fail. 變更密碼時，active Directory 需要安全連接。Active Directory requires a secure connection when changing passwords.
-您必須明確設定`connectionUsername`和`connectionPassword`屬性使用[新增項目 （ASP.NET 設定結構描述） 的成員資格提供者](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8423ec7f-a06d-4606-977e-a46400b2fc18)應用程式組態檔中; 否則執行個體將會擲回例外狀況。- You must explicitly set the `connectionUsername` and `connectionPassword` attributes using the [add Element for providers for membership (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8423ec7f-a06d-4606-977e-a46400b2fc18) in the application configuration file; otherwise, the instance will throw a exception.| |`Secure`|類別將嘗試連線到 Active Directory 使用 SSL。The class will attempt to connect to Active Directory using SSL. 如果 SSL 失敗，將會進行第二次嘗試連線到 Active Directory 使用簽署密封。If SSL fails, a second attempt to connect to Active Directory using sign-and-seal will be made. 如果這兩個嘗試都失敗，執行個體將會擲回例外狀況。If both attempts fail, the instance will throw a exception.

支援的程序認證和明確的認證。Both process credentials and explicit credentials are supported.| 下表顯示的效果`connectionProtection`屬性連接到 ADAM 伺服器時。The following table shows the effect of the `connectionProtection` attribute when connecting to an ADAM server. |`connectionProtection` 設定`connectionProtection` setting|作用Effect| |------------------------------------|------------| ||類別將會連接到 ADAM 伺服器，但有此限制。The class will connect to an ADAM server, with this restriction.

-任何設定密碼的方法將會失敗，除非您明確設定 ADAM 伺服器以允許密碼，才能傳送和變更透過不安全的連線。- Any method that sets passwords will fail unless you explicitly configure the ADAM server to allow passwords to be sent and changed over an insecure connection.

支援的程序認證和明確的認證。Both process credentials and explicit credentials are supported.| |`Secure`|類別將嘗試連線到 ADAM 伺服器使用 SSL。The class will attempt to connect to the ADAM server using SSL. 如果無法建立連線，執行個體將會擲回例外狀況。If a connection cannot be made, the instance will throw a exception.

支援的程序認證和明確的認證。Both process credentials and explicit credentials are supported.| ## ADAM 組態ADAM Configuration ADAM 執行個體使用 ADAM 伺服器時，必須包含定義的結構描述`User`類別。When using an ADAM server, the ADAM instance must contain a schema that defines the `User` class. 您可以匯入`User`類別的匯入 LDIF `MS-User.ldf` ADAM 安裝目錄中可使用的檔案。You can import the `User` class with an LDIF import of the `MS-User.ldf` file available in the ADAM install directory. 類別適用於與 ADAM 伺服器設定為使用預設的網路連接埠。The class will work with an ADAM server configured to use the default network ports. 下表顯示預期的 ADAM 伺服器的預設值。The following table shows the defaults expected for the ADAM server. |connectionProtection 設定connectionProtection setting|必須是的 ADAM 連接埠Expected ADAM port| |----------------------------------|------------------------| ||389389| |`Secure`|636636| 如果您的 ADAM 伺服器未使用的預設連接埠，請參閱文件 Q817583，「 Active Directory 服務不會要求安全授權透過 SSL 連線，「 在[Microsoft Knowledge Base](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37115)。If your ADAM server is not using the default ports, see article Q817583, "Active Directory Services does not request secure authorization over an SSL connection," in the [Microsoft Knowledge Base](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37115). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例顯示設定為使用 ASP.NET 應用程式的 Web.config 檔案執行個體。The following code examples show the Web.config file for an ASP.NET application configured to use an instance. 第一個範例會使用 Active Directory 屬性的預設對應，並不支援密碼重設安全性問題答案，也不能呼叫搜尋方法使用。The first example uses the default mappings for Active Directory attributes, and does not support password-reset security with question-and-answer nor the ability to call search methods. 第二個範例會顯示所有屬性設定為允許執行個體。The second example shows all the attribute settings allowed for an instance. 第一個範例是簡單的組態檔使用預設對應的 Active Directory 屬性。The first example is a simple configuration file using default mappings for Active Directory attributes. ``` ``` 這個範例會顯示所有可用執行個體的屬性設定。This example shows all of the attribute settings that are available for an instance of . ``` /> ``` `clientSearchTimeout` 和`serverSearchTimeout`預設值為分鐘。`clientSearchTimeout` and `serverSearchTimeout` default to minutes. 若要變更單位，設定`timeoutUnit`"Days"、"Hours"、"Minutes"、"Seconds"或"（毫秒） 」 的其中一個屬性值。To change the units, set the `timeoutUnit` attribute value to one of "Days", "Hours", "Minutes", "Seconds", or "Milliseconds". 如果未指定屬性，則預設為"Minutes"。If the attribute is not specified, the default is "Minutes".

span.span: Creates a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 建構函式由 ASP.NET 呼叫來建立的執行個體類別做為應用程式的組態中指定。The constructor is called by ASP.NET to create an instance of the class as specified in the configuration for the application. 這個建構函式不是從您的程式碼使用。This constructor is not intended to be used from your code.

span.span: The name of the application using the custom membership provider.

value.span: 使用自訂成員資格提供者的應用程式名稱。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性可以設定為 ASP.NET 應用程式的名稱; 不過，應用程式名稱不是由類別。The property can be set to the name of the ASP.NET application; however, the application name is not used by the class. 因此，不同於其他實作中，所有存取相同的 Active Directory 資料存放區，一律會共用相同的使用者資料的 ASP.NET 應用程式。Therefore, unlike other implementations, all ASP.NET applications that access the same Active Directory data store will always share the same user data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法用來更新 Active Directory 資料存放區中的使用者的密碼。The method is used to update the user's password in the Active Directory data store. 不論認證，執行個體設定為使用時，提供者連線至 Active Directory 伺服器使用`username`和`oldPassword`與連線認證參數。Regardless of the credentials that the instance is configured to use, the provider connects to the Active Directory server using the `username` and `oldPassword` parameters as the connection credentials. 如果屬性是`true`、 使用者無法變更他或她的密碼，如果先前鎖定帳戶，因為使用者太多，因此嘗試回答密碼問題。If the property is `true`, the user cannot change his or her password if the account was previously locked because the user made too many attempts to answer the password question. 使用者必須等候中指定的分鐘數屬性，才能變更密碼。The user will need to wait the number of minutes specified in the property before changing the password. 如果成功完成密碼變更和屬性是`true`，則會重設使用者的密碼解答追蹤計數器。If the password change succeeds and the property is `true`, then the user's bad password answer tracking counters are reset. 提供者尋找要執行的連接字串中指定的搜尋點啟動的使用者名稱的樹狀子目錄搜尋更新的使用者執行個體。The provider finds the user instance to update by performing a subtree search for the user name starting at the search point specified in the connection string. 請參閱類別主題取得有關連接字串的詳細資訊。See the class topic for more information about connection strings. 若要變更 Active Directory 伺服器上的密碼`connectionProtection`屬性必須設為。To change passwords on an Active Directory server the `connectionProtection` attribute must be set to . 當使用 ADAM 伺服器，`connectionProtection`屬性可以設為，但如果您已明確設定 ADAM 伺服器以允許透過不安全連接的密碼變更。When using an ADAM server, the `connectionProtection` attribute can be set to , but only if you explicitly configure the ADAM server to allow password change over unsecured connections.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會呼叫類別，以更新的密碼問題和解答的 Active Directory 成員資格存放區中的使用者。The method is called by the class to update the password question and answer for a user in the Active Directory membership store. 重設使用者的密碼時，需要密碼問題和解答提供額外一層安全性。Requiring a password question and answer provides an additional layer of security when resetting a user's password. 建立使用者名稱時，使用者可以提供問題和解答，稍後可以用來重設忘記的密碼。When creating a user name, a user can supply a question and answer that can later be used to reset a forgotten password. 方法會更新的密碼問題和解答的成員資格使用者的新值。The method updates the password question and answer for a membership user to new values. 若要使用方法，您必須在您的應用程式組態檔中設定這些額外的屬性：In order to use the method, you must set these additional attributes in your application's configuration file: - `requiresQuestionAndAnswer` 必須是 `true.``requiresQuestionAndAnswer` must be `true.` - `attributeMapPasswordQuestion` 和`attributeMapPasswordAnswer`必須對應到 Active Directory 架構中的屬性。`attributeMapPasswordQuestion` and `attributeMapPasswordAnswer` must be mapped to attributes in the Active Directory schema. 如果不符合上述準則，會在初始設定擲回。If the above criteria are not met, a is thrown at initialization. 執行個體連接到 Active Directory 資料存放區中提供的認證`username`和`password`參數來驗證使用者名稱/密碼組合。The instance connects to the Active Directory data store with the credentials provided in the `username` and `password` parameters to validate the user name/password combination. 實際的問題和解答的更新會執行的提供者設定的連接認證。The actual update of the question and answer is performed with the configured connection credentials of the provider. 如果不正確的密碼提供給方法中，目錄伺服器會遞增的計數器可追蹤無效的密碼嘗試次數。If an incorrect password is supplied to the method, the directory server will increment the counters that track invalid password attempts. 這會導致使用者鎖定和無法登入之前的鎖定狀態，以清除呼叫方法或目錄階段中指定的鎖定持續時間。This can result in the user being locked and unable to log on until either the lock status is cleared by a call to the method or the locked duration specified in the directory passes. 如果成功的問題和解答的更新和屬性是`true`、 使用者的密碼解答追蹤計數器會重設。If the update to the question and answer succeeds and the property is `true`, the user's bad password answer tracking counters are reset. 使用加密的密碼解答方法之前會儲存在 Active Directory 資料存放區。The password answer is encrypted using the method before it is stored in the Active Directory data store. 會指定加密金鑰和演算法[machineKey 項目 （ASP.NET 設定結構描述）](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4b5699a9-bc21-4c4a-85f1-8b3b8ebd2d46)組態項目。The encryption key and algorithm are specified by the [machineKey Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4b5699a9-bc21-4c4a-85f1-8b3b8ebd2d46) configuration element. 上的解密屬性[machineKey 項目 （ASP.NET 設定結構描述）](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4b5699a9-bc21-4c4a-85f1-8b3b8ebd2d46)元素必須加以指定、類別不支援自動產生的加密金鑰。The decryption attribute on the [machineKey Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4b5699a9-bc21-4c4a-85f1-8b3b8ebd2d46) element must be specified, the class does not support auto-generated encryption keys. 密碼問題的最大長度為 256 個字元。The maximum length for the password question is 256 characters. 密碼解答的最大長度為 128 個字元。The maximum length for the password answer is 128 characters. 開頭和尾端空白會從所有的參數值，除了修剪`password`。Leading and trailing spaces are trimmed from all parameter values except for `password`. 提供者尋找要執行的連接字串中指定的搜尋點啟動的使用者名稱的樹狀子目錄搜尋更新的使用者執行個體。The provider finds the user instance to update by performing a subtree search for the user name starting at the search point specified in the connection string. 請參閱類別主題取得有關連接字串的詳細資訊。See the class topic for more information about connection strings.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法透過呼叫類別來建立新的使用者在 Active Directory 資料存放區。The method is called by the class to create a new user in the Active Directory data store. Active Directory 和 Active Directory 應用程式模式 (ADAM) 伺服器類別會要求執行個體中的類別目錄是`user`。For both Active Directory and Active Directory Application Mode (ADAM) servers, the class requires that the instance class in the directory be `user`. 替代使用者之類的類別`inetOrgPerson`不支援。Alternative user classes such as `inetOrgPerson` are not supported. 當使用 Active Directory 伺服器和使用者名稱對應到`userPrincipalName`屬性類別會自動產生的隨機 20 個字元的使用者名稱`sAMAccountName`代表您的參數。When using an Active Directory server and the user name is mapped to the `userPrincipalName` attribute, the class will automatically generate a random 20-character user name for the `sAMAccountName` parameter on your behalf. 參數預設為下列的最大長度。Parameters default to the following maximum lengths. |參數Parameter|最大長度Maximum length| |---------------|--------------------| |`username`|64 個字元，如果使用`userPrincipalName`屬性。64 characters if using the `userPrincipalName` attribute. 如果使用`sAMAccountName`屬性，一般的限制為 20 個字元或更少。If using the `sAMAccountName` attribute, the common restriction is 20 characters or less.| |`password`|128 個字元。128 characters.| |`email`|256 個字元。256 characters.| |`passwordQuestion`|256 個字元。256 characters.| |`passwordAnswer`|之前和之後加密的 128 個字元。128 characters before and after encrypting.| 屬性傳回的執行個體僅限於 1024年個字元。The property on the returned instance is limited to 1024 characters. 如果藉由減少這些屬性的最大允許長度已修改的目錄結構描述，這些長度會優先。If the directory schema has been modified by reducing the maximum allowable lengths for these attributes, these lengths will take precedence. 建立使用者之前類別可確保使用者名稱是唯一的。Before creating the user, the class will make sure the user name is unique. 如果執行個體已設定為需要唯一的電子郵件地址，它也必須確定是唯一的電子郵件地址。If the instance is configured to require unique email addresses, it will also make sure the email address is unique. Active Directory 中使用者名稱會強制執行唯一性時的使用者名稱對應至執行 GC 搜尋`userPrincipalName`。In an Active Directory user-name uniqueness is enforced by performing a GC search when the user name is mapped to `userPrincipalName`. 如果`sAMAccountName`使用時，則目錄將會自動強制執行唯一性`sAMAccountName`跨 Active Directory 網域。If `sAMAccountName` is used, then the directory will automatically enforce uniqueness of the `sAMAccountName` across the Active Directory domain. ADAM 伺服器將會自動強制執行的使用者名稱唯一性`userPrincipalName`跨所有應用程式分割。An ADAM server will automatically enforce user name uniqueness of the `userPrincipalName` across all application partitions. 執行樹狀子目錄搜尋開始於根容器建立使用者的重複電子郵件地址的方式，會強制執行唯一性電子郵件地址。Uniqueness of the email address is enforced by performing a subtree search for a duplicate email address starting at the root of the container in which users are created. 這是預設使用者容器 （如果連接到 Active Directory 和任何容器已指定連接字串中） 或連接字串中指定的容器。This is either the default user container (if connected to an Active Directory and no container was specified in the connection string) or the container specified in the connection string. 類別會直接在連接字串中指定的使用者容器中建立使用者。The class creates the user directly in the user container specified in the connection string. 請參閱類別主題取得有關連接字串的詳細資訊。See the class topic for more information about connection strings. 在 Active Directory 伺服器上，設定密碼`connectionProtection`屬性必須設為。For passwords to be set on an Active Directory server, the `connectionProtection` attribute must be set to . 使用 ADAM 伺服器時，`connectionProtection`屬性可以設為，但如果您已明確設定 ADAM 伺服器以允許透過不安全連接的密碼變更。When an ADAM server is being used, the `connectionProtection` attribute can be set to , but only if you explicitly configure the ADAM server to allow password changes over unsecured connections. 開頭和尾端空白會刪減以外的所有字串參數值`password`。Leading and trailing spaces are trimmed from all string parameter values except `password`. > [!IMPORTANT] > 您無法建立新的使用者，用來連接到 Active Directory 伺服器的認證具有網域系統管理員權限 （不建議） 或 「 建立子執行個體，「 除非 「 刪除子系執行個體 」 和 設定密碼 」 存取權限。You cannot create new users unless the credentials used to connect to the Active Directory server have either Domain Administrator rights (not recommended) or the "create child instance," "delete child instance," and "set password" access rights. 「 刪除子系執行個體 」 存取權限是必要的因為建立的使用者是多步驟的程序，而且如果使用者建立的任何步驟失敗，類別將會刪除使用者執行個體而不是保留中的部分建構的使用者執行個體目錄。The "delete child instance" access right is required because creating a user is a multi-step process, and if any step of user creation fails, the class will delete the user instance rather than leave a partially constructed user instance in the directory.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會指出目前的安全性層級的執行個體設定為使用。The property indicates the current level of security that the instance is configured to use. 屬性根據`connnectionProtection`屬性集[新增項目 （ASP.NET 設定結構描述） 的成員資格提供者](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8423ec7f-a06d-4606-977e-a46400b2fc18)應用程式組態檔中。The property is based on the `connnectionProtection` attribute set with the [add Element for providers for membership (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8423ec7f-a06d-4606-977e-a46400b2fc18) in the application configuration file. `connectionProtection`屬性只能設定為或組態檔中。The `connectionProtection` attribute can only be set to or in the configuration file. 請參閱類別主題取得有關連接字串的詳細資訊。See the class topic for more information about connection strings. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例顯示 Web.config 項目，以設定来使用的 SSL 安全性通訊協定連線到 Active Directory 伺服器執行個體。The following code example shows a Web.config entry that configures an instance to use the SSL security protocol to connect to an Active Directory server. ``` ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會立即移除所識別的使用者`username`參數。The method immediately removes the user identified by the `username` parameter. 由於 Active Directory 資料存放區的目錄中，不同的區域不會儲存使用者資訊`deleteAllRelatedData`參數已忽略，雖然它必須設定為 `true`或`false`呼叫時方法。Since the Active Directory data store does not store user information in separate areas of the directory, the `deleteAllRelatedData` parameter is ignored, although it must be set to either `true` or `false` when calling the method. 類別會尋找使用者執行個體，若要刪除的連接字串所決定的使用者容器中執行的使用者名稱的單一層級搜尋。The class finds the user instance to delete by performing a single-level search for the user name in the users container determined by the connection string. 請參閱類別主題取得有關連接字串的詳細資訊。See the class topic for more information about connection strings. `username` 必須有 64 個字元或更少。`username` must be 64 characters or less. > [!IMPORTANT] > 您無法刪除使用者，除非用來連線到 Active Directory 伺服器的認證有可能是網域系統管理員權限 （不建議） 或 「 刪除子執行個體 」 存取權限。You cannot delete users unless the credentials used to connect to the Active Directory server have either Domain Administrator rights (not recommended) or the "delete child instances" access right.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會指出是否可以使用方法來重設使用者的密碼。The property indicates whether you can use the method to reset a user's password. 屬性設定您的應用程式組態檔使用`enablePasswordReset`屬性[元素 （ASP.NET 設定結構描述） 的成員資格](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b9c1ee8f-33ca-4361-8666-b42a0fe86049)項目。The property is set in your application's configuration file using the `enablePasswordReset` attribute of the [membership Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b9c1ee8f-33ca-4361-8666-b42a0fe86049) element. 您只能設定屬性`true`時下列[元素 （ASP.NET 設定結構描述） 的成員資格](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b9c1ee8f-33ca-4361-8666-b42a0fe86049)已進行項目設定。You can only set the property `true` when the following [membership Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b9c1ee8f-33ca-4361-8666-b42a0fe86049) element settings have been made. - `requiresQuestionAndAnswer` 必須是`true`。`requiresQuestionAndAnswer` must be `true`. - Active Directory 架構必須修改成包含儲存的密碼問題和解答，以及密碼解答變更嘗試的三種追蹤欄位的屬性。The Active Directory schema must be modified to contain attributes for storing the password question and answer, as well as the three tracking fields for password-answer change attempts. - `attributeMapPasswordQuestion``attributeMapPasswordAnswer`， `attributeMapFailedPasswordAnswerCount`， `attributeMapFailedPasswordAnswerTime`，和`attributeMapFailedPasswordAnswerLockoutTime`必須對應到 Active Directory 架構中的屬性。`attributeMapPasswordQuestion`, `attributeMapPasswordAnswer`, `attributeMapFailedPasswordAnswerCount`, `attributeMapFailedPasswordAnswerTime`, and `attributeMapFailedPasswordAnswerLockoutTime` must be mapped to attributes in the Active Directory schema. 如果不符合上述準則，會在初始設定擲回。If the above criteria are not met, a is thrown at initialization. 當應用程式組態檔中的連接字串指定 Active Directory 網域，而不是特定的伺服器，執行個體一律都會連線至具有 PDC 角色，以確保網域的網域控制站密碼變更才會生效，和當方法呼叫。When the connection string in the application configuration file specifies an Active Directory domain rather than a specific server, the instance will always connect to the domain controller that has the PDC role for the domain to ensure that password changes take effect and are available when the method is called. > [!NOTE] > 即使屬性是`true`，除非用來連接到 Active Directory 伺服器的認證具有網域系統管理員權限 （不建議） 或 「 重設密碼 」 存取權限，無法重設使用者密碼。Even if the property is `true`, you cannot reset user passwords unless the credentials used to connect to the Active Directory server have either Domain Administrator rights (not recommended) or the "reset password" access right. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例顯示 Web.config 項目，以設定来啟用密碼重設執行個體。The following code example shows a Web.config entry that configures an instance to enable password resets. 它會使用明確的認證的使用者指定的 「 重設密碼 」 存取權限。It uses the explicit credentials of a user given the "reset password" access right. > [!IMPORTANT] > 當您將使用者認證放在您的 Web.config 檔案中時，有潛在的安全性威脅。When you place user credentials in your Web.config file, there are potential security threats. 包含 Web.config 檔案的目錄的存取權限的使用者可以讀取的檔案，並因此看到認證。Users with access rights to the directory containing the Web.config file can read the file, and thus see the credentials. 如需有關如何防範這項威脅的詳細資訊，請參閱[加密組態資訊使用受保護的組態](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/51cdfe5b-9d82-458c-94ff-c551c4f38ed1)。For details on how to protect against this threat, see [Encrypting Configuration Information Using Protected Configuration](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/51cdfe5b-9d82-458c-94ff-c551c4f38ed1). ``` ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 搜尋 Active Directory 伺服器可能會消耗大量資源，因為屬性可讓您關閉搜尋導向方法。Because searching an Active Directory server is potentially resource intensive, the property enables you to turn off search-oriented methods. 屬性設定您的應用程式組態檔使用`enableSearchMethods`屬性[元素 （ASP.NET 設定結構描述） 的成員資格](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b9c1ee8f-33ca-4361-8666-b42a0fe86049)項目。The property is set in your application's configuration file using the `enableSearchMethods` attribute of the [membership Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b9c1ee8f-33ca-4361-8666-b42a0fe86049) element. 當屬性是`false`，沒有可用的方法，如下：When the property is `false`, the following methods are not available: - - - 提供者會使用樹狀子目錄搜尋從指定的連接字串中搜尋點開始。The provider uses a subtree search starting at the search point specified in the connection string. 請參閱類別主題取得有關連接字串的詳細資訊。See the class topic for more information about connection strings. 我們建議您不要啟用搜尋實際系統上，直到您已經確認所簽發的搜尋查詢類別不造成不良影響目錄伺服器的效能。We recommend that you do not enable searching on production systems until you have confirmed that the search queries issued by the class do not adversely impact your directory server's performance. 因為類別設計為無狀態 Web 環境，就無法使用基礎所公開的分頁最佳化應用程式開發介面。Since the class is designed for a stateless Web environment, it is unable to use the paging optimizations exposed by the underlying APIs. 這表示在大型目錄搜尋時的分頁作業相當耗費資源，且應予以避免。This means that paging operations during searches against large directories are very expensive and should be avoided. 搜尋作業一定會針對連接字串中設定的目錄伺服器或在連接字串指向網域的情況下自動選取的伺服器發出。Search operations are always issued against the directory server configured in the connection string, or an automatically selected server in the case of a connection string pointing at a domain. 提供者不為其搜尋方法使用通用類別目錄。The provider does not use a global catalog for its search methods. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例顯示 Web.config 項目，以設定啟用搜尋 Active Directory 伺服器的執行個體。The following code example shows a Web.config entry that configures an instance to enable searching an Active Directory server. ``` ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法取得其中含有使用者記錄，從 Active Directory 儲存符合`emailToMatch`參數。The method gets a containing the user records from the Active Directory store that match the `emailToMatch` parameters. 使用者資料錄的電子郵件地址傳回以遞增順序排序。The user records are returned sorted in ascending order by email address. `emailToMatch`參數會限制為 256 個字元。The `emailToMatch` parameter is limited to 256 characters. 類別將會發出使用這兩個搜尋`clientSearchTimeout`和`serverSearchTimeout`組態值。The class will issue the search using both the `clientSearchTimeout` and `serverSearchTimeout` configuration values. 因為類別執行搜尋目錄伺服器使用 512 每頁的資料列的頁面，逾時套用到所提取結果的每一頁類別。Since the class performs searches against the directory server using pages with 512 rows per page, the time-outs apply to each page of results fetched by the class. 例如，如果搜尋查詢會產生 1000 個資料列，類別會擷取這項資訊做為兩個頁面的資料。For example, if a search query results in 1,000 rows of data, the class will fetch this information as two pages of data. 這表示用戶端，並搜尋逾時將會開始從零時算起類別要求資料的第二個頁面。This means that the client and search time-outs will start counting from zero when the class requests the second page of data. 所傳回的結果方法受到`pageIndex`和`pageSize`參數。The results returned by the method are constrained by the `pageIndex` and `pageSize` parameters. `pageSize`參數指定的最大數目中傳回的執行個體。The `pageSize` parameter specifies the maximum number of instances to return in the . `pageIndex`參數會指定要傳回，其中 0 （零） 表示的第一頁的結果的分頁。The `pageIndex` parameter specifies which page of results to return, where 0 (zero) indicates the first page. `totalRecords`參數是`out`Active Directory 資料存放區中找到的參數，設定為相符的成員資格使用者總數。The `totalRecords` parameter is an `out` parameter that is set to the total number of matching membership users found in the Active Directory data store. 比方說，如果有 13 使用者設定的資料存放區，而`pageIndex`值為 1 以`pageSize`5，傳回會包含第 6 到第十個使用者。For example, if there are 13 users for the configured data store, and the `pageIndex` value was 1 with a `pageSize` of 5, the returned would contain the sixth through the tenth users. `totalRecords`參數會設定為 13。The `totalRecords` parameter would be set to 13. 您可以控制是否允許使用者，藉由設定搜尋屬性中的應用程式組態檔使用`enableSearchMethods`屬性[元素 （ASP.NET 設定結構描述） 的成員資格](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b9c1ee8f-33ca-4361-8666-b42a0fe86049)項目.You can control whether to allow searching for users, by setting the property in the application's configuration file using the `enableSearchMethods` attribute of the [membership Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b9c1ee8f-33ca-4361-8666-b42a0fe86049) element. 設定屬性`false`導致方法會擲回例外狀況。Setting the property to `false` causes the method to throw a exception. 提供者會使用樹狀子目錄搜尋從指定的連接字串中搜尋點開始。The provider uses a subtree search starting at the search point specified in the connection string. 請參閱類別主題取得有關連接字串的詳細資訊。See the class topic for more information about connection strings. 我們建議您不要啟用搜尋實際系統上，直到您已經確認所簽發的搜尋查詢類別不造成不良影響目錄伺服器的效能。We recommend that you do not enable searching on production systems until you have confirmed that the search queries issued by the class do not adversely impact your directory server's performance. 因為類別設計為無狀態 Web 環境，就無法使用基礎所公開的分頁最佳化應用程式開發介面。Since the class is designed for a stateless Web environment, it is unable to use the paging optimizations exposed by the underlying APIs. 這表示在大型目錄搜尋時的分頁作業相當耗費資源，且應予以避免。This means that paging operations during searches against large directories are very expensive and should be avoided. 搜尋作業一定會針對連接字串中設定的目錄伺服器或在連接字串指向網域的情況下自動選取的伺服器發出。Search operations are always issued against the directory server configured in the connection string, or an automatically selected server in the case of a connection string pointing at a domain. 提供者不為其搜尋方法使用通用類別目錄。The provider does not use a global catalog for its search methods.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法類別會呼叫方法類別來擷取的隨機密碼。The method of the class calls the method of the class to retrieve a random password. 密碼長度設定為值屬性。The password length is set to the value of the property. 密碼長度不可以小於 14。The password length can never be less than 14. 您可以特別呼叫方法藉由參考可以直接從提供者屬性的類別類別。You can specifically call the method by referencing the class directly from the Provider property of the class. 產生的密碼只能包含英數字元以及下列標點符號: ！ @# $%^ & \* （） _-+ = [{}]};: <>|。 /？。The generated password only contains alphanumeric characters and the following punctuation marks: !@#$%^&\*()_-+=[{]};:<>|./?. 沒有隱藏的或非可列印的控制字元會包含在產生的密碼。No hidden or non-printable control characters are included in the generated password. 產生的密碼至少會包含在指定的非英數字元數目屬性。The generated password will contain at least the number of non-alphanumeric characters specified in the property. 產生的密碼不會測試中的規則運算式與屬性。The generated password will not be tested with the regular expression in the property. > [!NOTE] > 類別不會產生符合複雜性需求設定的目錄中的密碼。The class does not generate passwords that match complexity requirements set in the directory. 很可能產生隨機密碼失敗目錄所設定的密碼複雜性規則。It is possible to generate a random password that fails the password complexity rules set by the directory.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會呼叫從 ASP.NET 應用程式組態檔中指定的 Active Directory 資料存放區擷取使用者資訊的類別。This method is called by the class to retrieve user information from the Active Directory data store specified in the ASP.NET application's configuration file. 所傳回的結果方法受到`pageIndex`和`pageSize`參數。The results returned by the method are constrained by the `pageIndex` and `pageSize` parameters. `pageSize`參數指定的最大數目中傳回的執行個體集合。The `pageSize` parameter specifies the maximum number of instances to return in the collection. `pageIndex`參數會指定要傳回，其中 0 （零） 表示的第一頁的結果的分頁。The `pageIndex` parameter specifies which page of results to return, where 0 (zero) indicates the first page. `totalRecords`參數是`out`Active Directory 資料存放區中找到的參數，設定為相符的成員資格使用者總數。The `totalRecords` parameter is an `out` parameter that is set to the total number of matching membership users found in the Active Directory data store. 比方說，如果有 13 使用者設定的資料存放區，而`pageIndex`值為 1 以 la `pageSize` 5，傳回會包含第 6 到第十個使用者。For example, if there are 13 users for the configured data store, and the `pageIndex` value was 1 with la `pageSize` of 5, the returned would contain the sixth through the tenth users. `totalRecords`參數會設定為 13。The `totalRecords` parameter would be set to 13. 您可以控制是否允許使用者藉由設定搜尋屬性中的應用程式組態檔使用`enableSearchMethods`屬性[元素 （ASP.NET 設定結構描述） 的成員資格](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b9c1ee8f-33ca-4361-8666-b42a0fe86049)項目。You can control whether to allow searching for users by setting the property in the application's configuration file using the `enableSearchMethods` attribute of the [membership Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b9c1ee8f-33ca-4361-8666-b42a0fe86049) element. 設定屬性`false`導致方法會擲回例外狀況。Setting the property to `false` causes the method to throw a exception. 提供者會使用樹狀子目錄搜尋從指定的連接字串中搜尋點開始。The provider uses a subtree search starting at the search point specified in the connection string. 請參閱類別主題取得有關連接字串的詳細資訊。See the class topic for more information about connection strings. 我們建議您不要啟用搜尋實際系統上，直到您已經確認所簽發的搜尋查詢類別不造成不良影響目錄伺服器的效能。We recommend that you do not enable searching on production systems until you have confirmed that the search queries issued by the class do not adversely impact your directory server's performance. 因為類別設計為無狀態 Web 環境，就無法使用基礎所公開的分頁最佳化應用程式開發介面。Since the class is designed for a stateless Web environment, it is unable to use the paging optimizations exposed by the underlying APIs. 這表示在大型目錄搜尋時的分頁作業相當耗費資源，且應予以避免。This means that paging operations during searches against large directories are very expensive and should be avoided. 搜尋作業一定會針對連接字串中設定的目錄伺服器或在連接字串指向網域的情況下自動選取的伺服器發出。Search operations are always issued against the directory server configured in the connection string, or an automatically selected server in the case of a connection string pointing at a domain. 提供者不為其搜尋方法使用通用類別目錄。The provider does not use a global catalog for its search methods.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會呼叫從 Active Directory 資料存放區擷取使用者名稱的類別，根據使用者的電子郵件地址。This method is called by the class to retrieve a user name from the Active Directory data store based on the email address for the user. 如果成員資格資料存放區中的多個使用者具有相同電子郵件地址，則會傳回第一個遇到的使用者名稱。If more than one user in the membership data store has the same email address, the first user name encountered is returned. 您可以設定`requiresUniqueEmail`屬性[元素 （ASP.NET 設定結構描述） 的成員資格](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b9c1ee8f-33ca-4361-8666-b42a0fe86049)元素`true`應用程式組態檔，以確保每個電子郵件位址在資料庫中的是唯一的。You can set the `requiresUniqueEmail` attribute of the [membership Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b9c1ee8f-33ca-4361-8666-b42a0fe86049) element to `true` in the application configuration file to ensure that each email address in the database is unique. 會修剪 `email` 參數值中的前置空格和後端空格。Leading and trailing spaces are trimmed from the `email` parameter value. 如果電子郵件地址是空的修剪之後,就會擲回。If the email address is empty after trimming, an is thrown. 如果電子郵件地址`null`，搜尋 Active Directory 資料存放區中的所有使用者名稱時，會傳回第一個使用者名稱。If the email address is `null`, all user names in the Active Directory data store are searched, and the first user name is returned. 我們建議您不要啟用搜尋實際系統上，直到您已經確認所簽發的搜尋查詢類別不造成不良影響目錄伺服器的效能。We recommend that you do not enable searching on production systems until you have confirmed that the search queries issued by the class do not adversely impact your directory server's performance. > [!IMPORTANT] > 方法會執行，即使屬性是`false`。The method will run even when the property is `false`. 因為類別設計為無狀態 Web 環境，就無法使用基礎所公開的分頁最佳化應用程式開發介面。Since the class is designed for a stateless Web environment, it is unable to use the paging optimizations exposed by the underlying APIs. 這表示在大型目錄搜尋時的分頁作業相當耗費資源，且應予以避免。This means that paging operations during searches against large directories are very expensive and should be avoided. 搜尋作業一定會針對連接字串中設定的目錄伺服器或在連接字串指向網域的情況下自動選取的伺服器發出。Search operations are always issued against the directory server configured in the connection string, or an automatically selected server in the case of a connection string pointing at a domain. 提供者不為其搜尋方法使用通用類別目錄。The provider does not use a global catalog for its search methods. 提供者會使用樹狀子目錄搜尋從指定的連接字串中搜尋點開始。The provider uses a subtree search starting at the search point specified in the connection string. 請參閱類別主題取得有關連接字串的詳細資訊。See the class topic for more information about connection strings.

summary.span: 取得允許使用者對密碼重設問題失敗的回應嘗試次數。

span.span: Gets the number of failed answer attempts a user is allowed for the password-reset question.

value.span: 在鎖定帳戶之前，允許使用者失敗的密碼回應嘗試次數。

span.span: The number of failed password answer attempts a user is allowed before the account is locked.

value.span: 預設值是5。

span.span: The default is 5.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當屬性是`true`，使用者必須回答密碼重設其密碼。When the property is `true`, the user must answer the password question to reset his or her password. 使用者所建立的時間間隔內允許有限的數目的解答嘗試屬性。The user is allowed a limited number of answer attempts within the time window established by the property. 如果密碼解答嘗試次數大於或等於值儲存在屬性，使用者會遭到鎖定而無法進一步嘗試分鐘數儲存在屬性。If the number of password answer attempts is greater than or equal to the value stored in the property, the user is locked out of further attempts for the number of minutes stored in the property. > [!NOTE] > 這個屬性不會控制使用者可以進行之前被鎖定的登入失敗的次數。Active Directory 伺服器處理登入嘗試失敗，並不會受到這個屬性的值。This property does not control the number of failed logon attempts a user can make before being locked out. The Active Directory server handles failed logon attempts and is not affected by the value of this property. 屬性設定您的應用程式組態檔使用`maxInvalidPasswordAttempts`屬性[元素 （ASP.NET 設定結構描述） 的成員資格](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b9c1ee8f-33ca-4361-8666-b42a0fe86049)項目。The property is set in your application's configuration file using the `maxInvalidPasswordAttempts` attribute of the [membership Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b9c1ee8f-33ca-4361-8666-b42a0fe86049) element. 如果應用程式的組態檔中，未設定的屬性屬性設定的預設值為`5`。If the property is not set in the application's configuration file, the property is set to the default value of `5`. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例顯示 Web.config 項目，以設定在 10 分鐘時間視窗中輸入的密碼解答嘗試要鎖定失敗，產生三個使用者執行個體。The following code example shows a Web.config entry that configures an instance to lock out users who make three failed attempts to enter the password answer in a 10-minute time window. 如果使用者遭到鎖定時，不進行任何可能在 15 分鐘進行嘗試回答密碼問題。If the user is locked out, no further attempts to answer the password question may be made for 15 minutes. ``` ```

summary.span: 取得有效的密碼中必須要有的特殊字元數目下限。

span.span: Gets the minimum number of special characters that must be present in a valid password.

value.span: 有效的密碼中必須要有的特殊字元數目下限。

span.span: The minimum number of special characters that must be present in a valid password.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會傳回特殊的非英數字元，必須輸入來建立有效的密碼最小數目。The property returns the minimum number of special, non-alphanumeric characters that must be entered to create a valid password. 屬性值會設定在應用程式組態中，使用`minRequiredNonalphanumericCharacters`屬性[元素 （ASP.NET 設定結構描述） 的成員資格](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b9c1ee8f-33ca-4361-8666-b42a0fe86049)組態項目。The property value is set in the application configuration using the `minRequiredNonalphanumericCharacters` attribute of the [membership Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b9c1ee8f-33ca-4361-8666-b42a0fe86049) configuration element. 非英數字元是字元的方法會傳回`false`。A non-alphanumeric character is a character for which the method returns `false`. ## Examples 下列範例所示[元素 （ASP.NET 設定結構描述） 的成員資格](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b9c1ee8f-33ca-4361-8666-b42a0fe86049)中的組態項目`system.web`應用程式的 Web.config 檔案區段。The following example shows the [membership Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b9c1ee8f-33ca-4361-8666-b42a0fe86049) configuration element in the `system.web` section of the application's Web.config file. 它會指定應用程式使用的執行個體類別提供成員資格服務與集`minRequiredNonalphanumericCharacters`屬性設定為一個字元。It specifies that the application use an instance of the class to provide membership services, and sets the `minRequiredNonalphanumericCharacters` attribute to one character. ``` ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會取得建立有效的密碼必須輸入的字元數目下限。The property gets the minimum number of characters that must be entered to create a valid password. 屬性值會設定在應用程式組態中，使用`minRequiredPasswordLength`屬性[元素 （ASP.NET 設定結構描述） 的成員資格](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b9c1ee8f-33ca-4361-8666-b42a0fe86049)組態項目。The property value is set in the application configuration using the `minRequiredPasswordLength` attribute of the [membership Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b9c1ee8f-33ca-4361-8666-b42a0fe86049) configuration element. ## Examples 下列範例所示[元素 （ASP.NET 設定結構描述） 的成員資格](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b9c1ee8f-33ca-4361-8666-b42a0fe86049)中的組態項目`system.web`應用程式的 Web.config 檔案區段。The following example shows the [membership Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b9c1ee8f-33ca-4361-8666-b42a0fe86049) configuration element in the `system.web` section of the application's Web.config file. 它會指定應用程式使用的執行個體類別提供成員資格服務與集`minRequiredPasswordLength`屬性設定為七個字元。It specifies that the application use an instance of the class to provide membership services, and sets the `minRequiredPasswordLength` attribute to seven characters. ``` ```

summary.span: 取得時間長度，使用者嘗試錯誤密碼回應的次數太多時，會在這個期間鎖定使用者帳戶。

span.span: Get the length of time for which a user account is locked out after the user makes too many bad password-answer attempts.

value.span: 在使用者提供不正確的密碼回應次數太多時鎖定使用者的時間 (以分鐘為單位)。

span.span: The time, in minutes, that a user is locked out after providing too many incorrect password answers.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當屬性是`true`，使用者必須回答密碼重設其密碼。When the property is `true`, the user must answer the password question to reset his or her password. 如果使用者無法提供正確答案連續的次數等於觀察所指定的時間週期內的屬性值屬性，使用者會進一步嘗試會基於鎖定的分鐘數包含在屬性。If the user fails to supply the correct answer a consecutive number of times equal to the property value within the observation time period specified by the property, the user is locked out of further attempts for the number of minutes contained in the property. > [!NOTE] > 這個屬性未設定使用者鎖定無法輸入有效的密碼後的持續時間。This property does not set the duration a user is locked out after failing to enter a valid password. Active Directory 伺服器處理登入嘗試失敗，並不會受到這個屬性的值。The Active Directory server handles failed logon attempts and is not affected by the value of this property. 我們建議最好讓屬性設定為相同的值為帳戶鎖定期間，指定太多失敗 Active Directory 組態中的登入嘗試。We recommend that the property be set to the same value as the account lockout duration specified for too many failed logon attempts in the Active Directory configuration. 這會呈現一致的自動鎖定行為的使用者，不論是否他們鎖定由於嘗試登入失敗或錯誤密碼解答。This will present consistent auto-lockout behavior for users regardless of whether they were locked out due to failed logon attempts or to bad password answers. 屬性設定您的應用程式組態檔使用`passwordAnswerAttemptLockoutDuration`屬性[元素 （ASP.NET 設定結構描述） 的成員資格](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b9c1ee8f-33ca-4361-8666-b42a0fe86049)項目。The property is set in your application's configuration file using the `passwordAnswerAttemptLockoutDuration` attribute of the [membership Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b9c1ee8f-33ca-4361-8666-b42a0fe86049) element. 如果應用程式的組態檔中，未設定的屬性屬性設定為預設值為 30 分鐘。If the property is not set in the application's configuration file, the property is set to the default value of 30 minutes. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例顯示 Web.config 項目，以設定在 10 分鐘時間視窗中輸入的密碼解答嘗試要鎖定失敗，產生三個使用者執行個體。The following code example shows a Web.config entry that configures an instance to lock out users who make three failed attempts to enter the password answer in a 10-minute time window. 如果使用者遭到鎖定時，不進行任何可能在 15 分鐘進行嘗試回答密碼問題。If the user is locked out, no further attempts to answer the password question may be made for 15 minutes. ``` ```

.property instance int32 PasswordAttemptWindow
Public Overrides ReadOnly Property PasswordAttemptWindow As Integer
public: virtual property int PasswordAttemptWindow { int get(); };

summary.span: 取得時間範圍，在此時間範圍內會追蹤提供有效密碼或有效密碼解答的連續失敗嘗試。

span.span: Gets the time window during which consecutive failed attempts to provide a valid password or a valid password answer are tracked.

value.span: 時間範圍 (以分鐘為單位)，在此時間範圍內會追蹤提供有效密碼或有效密碼解答的連續失敗嘗試。

span.span: The time window, in minutes, during which consecutive failed attempts to provide a valid password or a valid password answer are tracked.

value.span: 預設為 10 分鐘。

span.span: The default is 10 minutes.

value.span: 如果每次失敗嘗試之間的間隔大於 屬性設定，則 執行個體會將每次失敗嘗試都視為第一次失敗嘗試。

span.span: If the interval between each failed attempt is greater than the property setting, the instance treats each failed attempt as if it were the first failed attempt.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性可搭配內容，協助防範不必要的來源，破解的密碼或密碼解答的成員資格使用者，透過重複嘗試。The property works in conjunction with the property to help guard against an unwanted source guessing the password or password answer of a membership user through repeated attempts. 當使用者嘗試登入、 變更其密碼，或重設其密碼時，請指定的時間間隔內允許只有特定數目的連續嘗試。When users are attempting to log in, change their password, or reset their password, only a certain number of consecutive attempts are allowed within a specified time window. 所指定的時間間隔長度屬性，其可識別允許無效嘗試之間的分鐘數。The length of the time window is specified by the property, which identifies the number of minutes allowed between invalid attempts. 如果嘗試失敗的連續數使用者進行重設其或其密碼等於中儲存的值屬性，以及時間後經過無效上次小於指定的分鐘數屬性，則使用者帳戶 s 鎖定中所包含的分鐘數屬性。If the number of consecutive failed attempts a user makes to reset his or her password equals the value stored in the property, and the time elapsed since the last invalid attempt is less than the number of minutes specified for the property, then the user account s locked out for the number of minutes contained in the property. 如果目前的失敗的嘗試和上一次的失敗的嘗試之間的間隔超過屬性設定值，目前的無效嘗試視為第一次嘗試。If the interval between the current failed attempt and the last failed attempt is greater than the property setting, the current invalid attempt is counted as the first attempt. 如果之前允許的無效嘗試次數上限為止，請提供有效的密碼解答，無效的密碼解答嘗試計數是設定為零。If a valid password answer is supplied before the maximum number of allowed invalid attempts is reached, the count of invalid password-answer attempts is set to zero. 如果允許無效的最大數目之前提供有效的密碼嘗試次數達到時，不正確的密碼嘗試次數的計數和無效的密碼解答嘗試計數設定為零。If a valid password is supplied before the maximum number of allowed invalid attempts is reached, the count of invalid password attempts and the count of invalid password-answer attempts are set to zero. 我們建議最好讓屬性設定為相同的值為帳戶鎖定期間指定為最大數目的失敗登入嘗試次數 Active Directory 組態中。We recommend that the property be set to the same value as the account lockout duration that is specified for the maximum number of failed logon attempts in the Active Directory configuration. 這會在他們鎖定由於嘗試登入失敗或錯誤密碼解答是否呈現一致的自動鎖定行為的使用者。This will present consistent auto-lockout behavior for users whether they were locked out due to failed logon attempts or to bad password answers. 屬性設定您的應用程式組態檔使用`passwordAttemptWindow`屬性[元素 （ASP.NET 設定結構描述） 的成員資格](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b9c1ee8f-33ca-4361-8666-b42a0fe86049)項目。The property is set in your application's configuration file using the `passwordAttemptWindow` attribute of the [membership Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b9c1ee8f-33ca-4361-8666-b42a0fe86049) element. 如果應用程式的組態檔中，未設定的屬性屬性設定為預設值為 10 分鐘。If the property is not set in the application's configuration file, the property is set to the default value of 10 minutes. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例顯示 Web.config 項目，以設定在 10 分鐘時間視窗中輸入的密碼解答嘗試要鎖定失敗，產生三個使用者執行個體。The following code example shows a Web.config entry that configures an instance to lock out users who make three failed attempts to enter the password answer in a 10-minute time window. 如果使用者遭到鎖定時，不進行任何可能在 15 分鐘進行嘗試回答密碼問題。If the user is locked out, no further attempts to answer the password question may be made for 15 minutes. ``` ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會取得用來評估密碼複雜度的規則運算式。The property gets the regular expression used to evaluate password complexity. 屬性不用來驗證中的自動產生密碼方法。The property is not used to validate auto-generated passwords in the method. 屬性設定在應用程式組態中，使用`passwordStrengthRegularExpression`屬性[元素 （ASP.NET 設定結構描述） 的成員資格](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b9c1ee8f-33ca-4361-8666-b42a0fe86049)組態項目。The property is set in the application configuration using the `passwordStrengthRegularExpression` attribute of the [membership Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b9c1ee8f-33ca-4361-8666-b42a0fe86049) configuration element. ## Examples 下列範例所示[元素 （ASP.NET 設定結構描述） 的成員資格](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b9c1ee8f-33ca-4361-8666-b42a0fe86049)中的組態項目`system.web`應用程式的 Web.config 檔案區段。The following example shows the [membership Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b9c1ee8f-33ca-4361-8666-b42a0fe86049) configuration element in the `system.web` section of the application's Web.config file. 它會指定應用程式使用的執行個體類別提供成員資格服務與集`passwordStrengthRegularExpression`屬性驗證的密碼是否符合下列條件的規則運算式：It specifies that the application use an instance of the class to provide membership services and sets the `passwordStrengthRegularExpression` attribute to a regular expression that validates that the password meets the following criteria: - Is greater than 七個字元。Is greater than seven characters. - 包含至少一個數字。Contains at least one digit. - 包含至少一個特殊的 （非英數） 字元。Contains at least one special (non-alphanumeric) character. 如果密碼不符合這些準則，成員資格提供者不接受的密碼。If the password does not meet these criteria, the password is not accepted by the membership provider. ``` ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性設定您的應用程式組態檔使用`requiresQuestionAndAnswer`屬性[元素 （ASP.NET 設定結構描述） 的成員資格](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b9c1ee8f-33ca-4361-8666-b42a0fe86049)項目。The property is set in your application's configuration file using the `requiresQuestionAndAnswer` attribute of the [membership Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b9c1ee8f-33ca-4361-8666-b42a0fe86049) element. 如果應用程式的組態檔中，未設定的屬性屬性設定的預設值為`false`。If the property is not set in the application's configuration file, the property is set to the default value of `false`. 當`requiresQuestionAndAnswer`屬性設為`true`，您也必須設定這些額外的屬性。When the `requiresQuestionAndAnswer` attribute is set to `true`, you must also set these additional attributes. - `attributeMapPasswordQuestion` 和`attributeMapPasswordAnswer`必須對應到 Active Directory 架構中的屬性。`attributeMapPasswordQuestion` and `attributeMapPasswordAnswer` must be mapped to attributes in the Active Directory schema. 如果不符合上述準則，會在初始設定擲回。If the above criteria are not met, a is thrown at initialization. > [!NOTE] > 您可以建立使用者時需要密碼問題和解答，但設屬性`false`以防止使用者變更他們使用的密碼類別。You can require a password question and answer when creating a user, but set the property to `false` to prevent users from changing their passwords using the class. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例顯示 Web.config 項目，以設定来啟用密碼重設執行個體。The following code example shows a Web.config entry that configures an instance to enable password resets. 它會使用明確的認證的使用者指定的 「 重設密碼 」 存取權限。It uses the explicit credentials of a user given the "reset password" access right. > [!IMPORTANT] > 當您將使用者認證放在您的 Web.config 檔案中時，有潛在的安全性威脅。When you place user credentials in your Web.config file, there are potential security threats. 包含 Web.config 檔案的目錄的存取權限的使用者可以讀取的檔案，並因此看到認證。Users with access rights to the directory containing the Web.config file can read the file, and thus see the credentials. 如需有關如何防範這項威脅的詳細資訊，請參閱[加密組態資訊使用受保護的組態](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/51cdfe5b-9d82-458c-94ff-c551c4f38ed1)。For details on how to protect against this threat, see [Encrypting Configuration Information Using Protected Configuration](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/51cdfe5b-9d82-458c-94ff-c551c4f38ed1). ``` ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會呼叫隨機 Active Directory 資料存放區中的使用者密碼重設到新的類別產生的值。The method is called by the class to reset the password for a user in the Active Directory data store to a new randomly generated value. 傳回新的密碼。The new password is returned. > [!NOTE] > 所建立的隨機密碼方法不保證傳遞規則運算式中的屬性。The random password created by the method is not guaranteed to pass the regular expression in the property. 不過，隨機密碼將會符合所建立的準則和屬性。However, the random password will meet the criteria established by the and properties. 如果不正確的回應提供給方法時，追蹤無效的密碼解答嘗試都會加一的內部計數器。If an incorrect answer is supplied to the method, the internal counter that tracks invalid password-answer attempts is incremented by one. 這會導致使用者無法登入，直到鎖定狀態的呼叫，以清除方法。This can result in the user being unable to log on until the lock status is cleared by a call to the method. 如果提供正確的密碼解答，且使用者目前並不遭到鎖定，則會追蹤無效的密碼嘗試次數的內部計數器會重設為零。If the correct password answer is supplied and the user is not currently locked out, then the internal counter that tracks invalid password attempts is reset to zero. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱和屬性。For more information, see the and properties. 所有參數值會都修剪開頭和尾端空白。Leading and trailing spaces are trimmed from all parameter values. 您可以呼叫方法，直接由第一次取得參考的執行個體屬性。You can call the method directly by first obtaining a reference to the instance from the property. 提供者會使用樹狀子目錄搜尋從指定的連接字串中搜尋點開始。The provider uses a subtree search starting at the search point specified in the connection string. 請參閱類別主題取得有關連接字串的詳細資訊。See the class topic for more information about connection strings. 若要在 Active Directory 伺服器上，設定密碼`connectionProtection`屬性必須設為。To set passwords on an Active Directory server, the `connectionProtection` attribute must be set to . 當使用 ADAM 伺服器，`connectionProtection`屬性可以設為，但如果您已明確設定 ADAM 伺服器以允許透過不安全連接的密碼變更。When using an ADAM server, the `connectionProtection` attribute can be set to , but only if you explicitly configure the ADAM server to allow password changes over unsecured connections. > [!IMPORTANT] > 除非用來連接到 Active Directory 伺服器的認證具有網域系統管理員權限 （不建議） 或 「 重設密碼 」 存取權限，無法重設密碼。You cannot reset passwords unless the credentials used to connect to the Active Directory server have either Domain Administrator rights (not recommended) or the "reset password" access right. 重設密碼，所有下列條件必須成立：To reset a password, all of the following conditions must be true: - 屬性必須設定為`true`。The property must be set to `true`. - Active Directory 架構必須修改成包含儲存的密碼問題和解答，屬性和三種追蹤欄位的密碼解答的變更。The Active Directory schema must be modified to contain attributes for storing the password question and answer, and the three tracking fields for password answer changes. - `attributeMapPasswordQuestion`， `attributeMapPasswordAnswer`， `attributMapFailedPasswordAnswerCount`， `attributeMapFailedPasswordAnswerTime`，和`attributeMapFailedPasswordAnswerLockedTime`屬性必須設定應用程式組態檔中。The `attributeMapPasswordQuestion`, `attributeMapPasswordAnswer`, `attributMapFailedPasswordAnswerCount`, `attributeMapFailedPasswordAnswerTime`, and `attributeMapFailedPasswordAnswerLockedTime` attributes must be set in the application configuration file. - 屬性必須設定為`true`。The property must be set to `true`. - 連線至 Active Directory 資料存放區 （處理帳戶或明確的認證） 的安全性內容中必須有足夠的權限，才能變更密碼。The security context for connecting to the Active Directory data store (either the process account or the explicit credentials) must have sufficient privileges to change passwords. 用來連接到 Active Directory 伺服器的認證具有網域系統管理員權限 （不建議） 或 「 重設密碼 」 存取權限。The credentials used to connect to the Active Directory server have either Domain Administrator rights (not recommended) or the "reset password" access right. > [!NOTE] > 設定 Active Directory 伺服器上的安全性原則可能會使得方法來產生密碼符合原則。Security policies set on the Active Directory server may make it impossible for the method to generate a password that satisfies the policies. 預設實作方法會產生滿足網域控制站執行 Windows Server 2003 SP1 上的預設密碼原則的密碼。The default implementation of the method will generate passwords that satisfy the default password policies on domain controllers running Windows Server 2003 SP1. 如果無法重設密碼，因為安全性原則的 Active Directory 伺服器上，就會擲回。If the password cannot be reset due to security policies on the Active Directory server, a is thrown.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用者最常鎖定且無法驗證所方法時屬性中指定的時間內超過屬性或嘗試次數過多時進行登入使用的密碼錯誤。Users are most commonly locked out and cannot be validated by the method when the property is exceeded within the time specified in the property or when too many attempts have been made to log on using the wrong password. 如果屬性是`true`，當使用者時，解除鎖定計數器會重設不正確的密碼。If the property is `true`, when a user is unlocked the counters for bad passwords are reset. 提供者會使用樹狀子目錄搜尋從指定的連接字串中搜尋點開始。The provider uses a subtree search starting at the search point specified in the connection string. 請參閱類別主題取得有關連接字串的詳細資訊。See the class topic for more information about connection strings. 會修剪 `username` 參數值中的前置空格和後端空格。Leading and trailing spaces are trimmed from the `username` parameter value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會呼叫類別來驗證使用者認證，針對 Active Directory 資料存放區。This method is called by the class to validate user credentials against the Active Directory data store. 如果屬性是`true`和提供的認證有效，而且會重設錯誤密碼解答的使用者追蹤計數器。If the property is `true` and the supplied credentials are valid, the user's tracking counters for bad password answers are reset. 方法可能會傳回`false`當正確的認證提供時，在下列情況：The method may return `false` when the correct credentials are supplied, under the following circumstances: 1. 使用者帳戶已鎖定目錄伺服器因為失敗的登入嘗試次數過多。The user account was locked out by the directory server because of too many failed logon attempts. 使用者無法登入目錄的鎖定期間到期之前。The user will not be able to log on until the directory's lockout duration passes. 2. 如果屬性是`true`，如果使用者提供不正確的密碼解答次數太多鎖定的使用者帳戶。If the property is `true`, the user account will be locked if the user supplied a bad password answer too many times. 使用者的帳戶將會解除鎖定中指定的時間之後屬性已通過。The user's account will unlock after the time specified in the property has passed. 3. 使用者必須存在於連接字串中指定的容器。The user must exist in the container specified in the connection string. 位於不同的容器或不同的網域使用者帳戶提供有效的認證。Valid credentials are supplied for a user account located in a different container or in a different domain. 使用者必須存在於連接字串中指定的容器。The user must exist in the container specified in the connection string. 當驗證使用者時，提供者會藉由連接到使用指定的使用者名稱和密碼，不將應用程式組態檔中設定的認證在 Active Directory 資料存放區驗證認證。When validating a user, the provider validates the credentials by connecting to the Active Directory data store using the specified user name and password, not the credentials configured in the application configuration file. 不過，執行個體將會連接到使用已設定的認證，原因如下的目錄。However, the instance will connect to the directory using the configured credentials for the following reasons. - 若要確認使用者是否存在的搜尋範圍由內執行個體的連接字串。To confirm that a user exists within the search scope as determined by the instance's connection string. 提供者會使用樹狀子目錄搜尋從指定的連接字串中搜尋點開始，以判斷使用者是否存在。The provider uses a subtree search starting at the search point specified in the connection string to determine whether a user exists. 使用者必須存在於指定的容器。The user must exist in the specified container. 將不會驗證連接字串指定的容器外有效的認證。Credentials that are valid outside the connection string's specified container will not be validated. 請參閱類別主題取得有關連接字串的詳細資訊。See the class topic for more information about connection strings. - 如果屬性是`true`、執行個體會載入使用者執行個體，以檢查是否有已鎖定使用者因為他或她發出太多失敗的變更的密碼解答嘗試使用已設定的認證.If the property is `true`, the instance will use the configured credentials to load the user instance to check whether the user has been locked out because he or she has made too many failed attempts to change the password answer. > [!IMPORTANT] > 啟用 「 來賓 」 帳戶連接到 Active Directory 網域控制站可能會造成安全性威脅。Connecting to an Active Directory domain controller with the "Guest" account enabled is a potential security threat. 啟用 「 來賓 」 帳戶的 Active Directory 網域控制站上所做的所有驗證嘗試會都成功。All validation attempts made on an Active Directory domain controller with the "Guest" account enabled will succeed. 若要使用的 Active Directory 網域控制站時，請提高安全性，您應該停用網域控制站上的 「 來賓 」 帳戶。To improve security when using an Active Directory domain controller, you should disable the "Guest" account on the domain controller. 當符合下列條件時，執行個體將會嘗試並行繫結，對 Active Directory:The instance will attempt a concurrent bind against Active Directory when one of the following conditions is met: - 屬性設定為 。The property is set to . - 屬性設定為和 SSL 會選擇保障連線安全的執行個體。The property is set to and SSL is chosen by the instance to secure the connection. 此外，可供並行的繫結，下列條件必須成立：In addition, for a concurrent bind to be made, the following conditions must be true: - 目錄伺服器必須執行 Windows Server 2003 上。The directory server must be running on Windows Server 2003. - 執行網頁伺服器的作業系統執行個體必須支援並行的繫結 (例如，Windows Server 2003)。The operating system of the Web server running the instance must support concurrent binds (for example, Windows Server 2003). 當使用並行的繫結時，使用者的上次登入日期不會更新目錄中;因此，屬性無法依賴。When a concurrent bind is used, the last logon date for the user is not updated in the directory; therefore, the property cannot be relied on. 開頭和尾端空白會刪減`username`參數。Leading and trailing spaces are trimmed from the `username` parameter.
